title: Desired by My Unknown Husband
overview: Frank, a small-town boy, hastily married urbanite Andrew, chosen by his grandmotherly friends, without recognizing each other. Andrew disappeared after going abroad for work. A year later, Frank's boss, the wealthy and charming Andrew, pursued him, leading to an affair. The once-playboy Andrew learned commitment and restraint, while Frank, once betrayed, regained trust and learned to love freely. At the divorce site, Frank discovered his husband and boss were the same person.
